cab.content: Au.JliiJMilitary Secret.1337h-oWrom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,24th March 1920.(Received 25th.)3868. 24th March. Malleson wired 15th March, repeating Tehran:-"I have received a report dated 13th March from my officer at Bujnurd, that Bolshevik troops recently at Chikishlyar are said to be returning in a north-eaoterly direction towards the railway, and that there are now no Bolshevik troops near Chat-i-Atrak."
